frameset.edef: to be ungrateful or unthankful, to be thankless

example.parse: (PUNC ,) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P كُننا) (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV1P+IV نِتبَطَّر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN_PROP عَمْرو) (NOUN_PROP خالِد)))))) (PUNC ?))
